intro: Coptosperma, commonly known as the African starleaf, is a genus of flowering plants in the family Asteraceae. It is characterized by its distinctive star-shaped leaves and yellowish to orange-colored flowers. The genus includes several species, most of which are native to southern Africa. Coptosperma plants typically grow in moist, shaded environments such as forests and stream banks. They are often used in horticulture for their ornamental value and ability to thrive in humid conditions.
